channel.title: [Pi] HELP Plz plz plzzz! [Pea eyes]
channel.description:
I got a project insanity base and its RuneFx its like 474 or something and its different than any server i've had
the drops on it i just found out how to add but im still not exactly sure on the percentage or rate or whatever
example, here is the Kree ara drops (armadyl boss)
// Kree' ara (Armadyl Boss) {6222,995,200000,7}, {6222,11710,1,35}, {6222,11712,1,35}, {6222,11714,1,35}, {6222,11702,1,57}, {6222,11718,1,35}, {6222,11720,1,35}, {6222,11722,1,35}, {6222,3024,1,0}, {6222,9244,40,3},
Ok so i understand the order.. {Monster ID,Item ID,Amount,Drop rate}
But look, Super restore (4), 3024 is the id and its drop rate is 0 and it gets dropped everytime.. And Armadyl platelegs is 11720 and the drop rate i put as 35 .. and it gets dropped very often.. Please someone make this clear to me on how to make a drop rare ? please please..
or add me on MSN: N3wdivide@yahoo.com ;D

Config.java…

I post like 1 a day and its because i have no one to help me i have to depend on moparscape index because google doesent tell me what i need to know

im sorry for using this forum for what its for ;\
